Articles.Content:
Am I the only one where the runway actively repels me when I'm trying to land?  I'm flying a small airplane with small gear and whether I set auto suspension or play around with the parameters I can't seem to get any landings without some sort of crazy bouncing happening. Friction is set very low on the nosewheel, and this happens before I even try braking.

It almost feels like the auto-suspension landing gear springs are being made stiffer after the plane compresses them but before the rebound, which would add nonphysical energy to the system.
I think the little gear is better, but I am still getting my head around landing. Most of my landings have been quite bouncy.
